frame.name: Left_to_do
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Process</fen> of using or modifying is scheduled to be applied to a group or mass. At a certain <fen>Time</fen>, the <fen>Remainder</fen> that is still left to be processed can be identified. The <fen>Agent</fen> who is in line to work on the <fen>Remainder</fen> is usually deprofiled but may sometimes be expressed.
<ex><fex name="rem">Three more cars</fex> <t>remain</t> <fex name="Process">to be fixed</fex>.</ex> <ex>We have done the first twenty so there are <fex name="rem">only five more letters</fex> <t>remaining</t> <fex name="pro">DNI</fex></ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Process
FE.definition:
<def-root>The activity that is being applied to the mass or the set of entities.
<ex>An additional eighty-three invitations <t>remain</t> <fex name="pro">to be sent</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Remainder
FE.definition:
<def-root>The mass or group that has not yet been processed.
<ex>In this case everyone should be informed by word of mouth to contact the person holding the list to find out <fex name="rem">which gifts</fex> still <t>remain</t> to be bought.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time when the <fen>Remainder</fen> is assessed.
<ex><fex name="tm">Now</fex> only three more items <t>remain</t> to be sold</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individuals who are scheduled to apply the <fen>Process</fen> to the <fen>Remainder</fen>. The <fen>Agent</fen> may be the same or a different individual who applied the process to the part that has already undergone the <fen>Process</fen>.
<ex>To insure my appointment, much will <t>remain</t> <fex name="agt">for you</fex> to do</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: remain.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: be left after others or other parts have been dealt with

lexUnit.name: remainder.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a part, number, or quantity that is left over to process
